review: The picture quality is fantastic.  The sound is also excellent.  Movies stream almost instantly.I can only give 3 stars because of some limitations that were not even remotely made clear on the 'sales' page.  For instance, the screen mirroring is only available with newer devices already running miracast.  The sales page makes no mention of that, but you'll find some references if you dig deep into the fine print and 'learn' more links.Overall, it advertises a lot of interconnected features that as you learn more, are only available with a Fire phone, Fire HDX tablet or Kindle.Another thing is the device has a network cable port, but if you use it, you won't be able to see the box on your WIFI connected phone.  Important if you want to control apps like Spotify with your Android phone.  You have to make sure the Fire box is also on the WIFI, not hardwired.If these things don't matter to you, or you have the Fire devices, than it's a fantastic deal.
